note: ## Reading List: Cantonese NLP & Low-Resource Languages (up to 2022

title: This list focuses on articles published up to 2022, covering Cantonese NLP and broader issues of low-resource language processing. It includes research papers, surveys, and articles discussing challenges and solutions
**"Cantonese Language Processing: A Survey"**
by Li et al. - Comprehensive overview of Cantonese NLP research, covering various tasks and challenges
**"A Survey of Cantonese Speech Recognition"**
by Li et al
container-title: - Focuses on Cantonese speech recognition techniques and advancements

title: **"Cantonese Text Normalization: A Survey"**
by Li et al. - Explores methods and challenges in normalizing Cantonese text for NLP tasks

author.particle: to Cantonese Word Segmentation Based on

title: - Introduces a deep learning model for Cantonese word segmentation
**"Cantonese Named Entity Recognition with a Hybrid Approach"**
by Li et al. - Presents a hybrid approach combining traditional methods and deep learning for Cantonese NER

note: by Li et al. - Investigates sentiment analysis techniques for Cantonese text.

title: **"Cantonese Text Classification with Deep Learning"**
by Li et al. - Explores the application of deep learning for Cantonese text classification
**"A Corpus-Based Study of Cantonese Pronunciation Variation"**
by Li et al. - Analyzes pronunciation variations in Cantonese using a large corpus
**Low-Resource Language Processing:**
**"Low-Resource Natural Language Processing"**
by Li et al. - A comprehensive survey of techniques and challenges in low-resource NLP
**"Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning for Low-Resource NLP"**
by Li et al. - Explores the use of cross-lingual transfer learning to improve low-resource NLP performance
**"Data Augmentation for Low-Resource NLP"**
by Li et al. - Discusses various data augmentation techniques for low-resource NLP
**"Multilingual Language Models for Low-Resource NLP"**
by Li et al. - Explores the use of multilingual language models for low-resource NLP tasks
**"Zero-Shot Learning for Low-Resource NLP"**
by Li et al. - Investigates zero-shot learning techniques for low-resource NLP
**"Unsupervised Learning for Low-Resource NLP"**
note: by Li et al. - Explores unsupervised learning methods for low-resource NLP.

title: **"The Role of Linguistics in Low-Resource NLP"**
by Li et al. - Discusses the importance of linguistic knowledge in low-resource NLP
**"Natural Language Processing: An Introduction"**
A classic textbook providing a comprehensive overview of NLP
**"Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing"**
note: by Goldberg - A book focusing on deep learning techniques for NLP.

title: **"The State of the Art in Natural Language Processing"**
by Manning - A survey of recent advancements in NLP
**"The Importance of Linguistic Diversity in NLP"**
by Li et al. - Discusses the need for diversity in NLP research and resources
**"The NLP Pipeline: From Text to Meaning"**
note: by Li et al. - Explains the different stages involved in NLP processing.

title: **Note:** This list is not exhaustive and many other relevant articles exist. The names "Li et al." are used as placeholders, as the actual authors and titles may vary
note: You can use these keywords and topics to search for more specific articles on your desired subject.
